reference: Feldstein, Martin (1988a), Feldstein on the Dollar: Let the Market Decide, The Economist, December 5, 1988.

Feldstein, Martin and Bachetta, Phillipe, National Savings and International Investment, in John Shoven and Douglas Bernheim, ads., The Economics of Savings, Chicago: University of Chicago Press, (forthcoming).
